text: falaA taDoribuwA@ lil~ahi {lo>amovaAla <in~a {ll~aha yaEolamu wa>antumo laA taEolamuwna

text: Daraba {ll~ahu mavalFA EabodFA m~amoluwkFA l~aA yaqodiru EalaY` $aYo'K waman r~azaqona`hu min~aA rizoqFA HasanFA fahuwa yunfiqu minohu sir~FA wajahorFA halo yasotawu,na {loHamodu lil~ahi balo >akovaruhumo laA yaEolamuwna

text: waDaraba {ll~ahu mavalFA r~ajulayoni >aHaduhumaA^ >abokamu laA yaqodiru EalaY` $aYo'K wahuwa kal~N EalaY` mawolaY`hu >ayonamaA yuwaj~ihh~u laA ya>oti bixayorK halo yasotawiY huwa waman ya>omuru bi{loEadoli wahuwa EalaY` Sira`TK m~usotaqiymK

text: wa{ll~ahu jaEala lakum m~in[ buyuwtikumo sakanFA wajaEala lakum m~in juluwdi {lo>anoEa`mi buyuwtFA tasotaxif~uwnahaA yawoma ZaEonikumo wayawoma <iqaAmatikumo wamino >aSowaAfihaA wa>awobaArihaA wa>a$oEaArihaA^ >ava`vFA wamata`EFA <ilaY` HiynK

text: fa<in tawal~awoA@ fa<in~amaA Ealayoka {lobala`gu {lomubiynu

text: wayawoma naboEavu fiY kul~i >um~apK $ahiydFA Ealayohim m~ino >anfusihimo waji}onaA bika $ahiydFA EalaY` ha`^&ulaA^'i wanaz~alonaA Ealayoka {lokita`ba tiboya`nFA l~ikul~i $aYo'K wahudFY waraHomapF wabu$oraY` lilomusolimiyna

text: wa>awofuwA@ biEahodi {ll~ahi <i*aA Ea`hadt~umo walaA tanquDuwA@ {lo>ayoma`na baEoda tawokiydihaA waqado jaEalotumu {ll~aha Ealayokumo kafiylFA <in~a {ll~aha yaEolamu maA tafoEaluwna

text: walaA tat~axi*uw^A@ >ayoma`nakumo daxalF[A bayonakumo fatazil~a qadamN[ baEoda vubuwtihaA wata*uwquwA@ {ls~uw^'a bimaA Sadadt~umo Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi walakumo Ea*aAbN EaZiymN

text: mano Eamila Sa`liHFA m~in *akarK >awo >unvaY` wahuwa mu&ominN falanuHoyiyan~ahu, Hayaw`pF Tay~ibapF walanajoziyan~ahumo >ajorahum bi>aHosani maA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna

text: man kafara bi{ll~ahi min[ baEodi <iyma`nihi.^ <il~aA mano >ukoriha waqalobuhu, muToma}in~N[ bi{lo<iyma`ni wala`kin m~an $araHa bi{lokufori SadorFA faEalayohimo gaDabN m~ina {ll~ahi walahumo Ea*aAbN EaZiymN
